talk2017:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Ah, so you have gathered everything
we need!

All right. Wait right there.
talk2018:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Wait...<sp:5:0:0> You already have the
Lightscale Trident, <sp:5:0:0>correct?

That weapon is not some trinket to be
duplicated without purpose.<sp:5:1:0> There is no
need for me to craft another at present.
talk2027_1:
<clr:0000>Lady Yona <clr:ffff>is even now attempting to
repair your armor. I suggest you confer
with her in the <clr:0000>infirmary<clr:ffff> at once.
talk2027_2:
<clr:0000>Lady Yona <clr:ffff>is even now attempting to
repair your armor. I suggest you confer
with her in <clr:0000>Mipha Court<clr:ffff> at once.
talk2020:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>The Lightscale Trident...<sp:5:0:0> Make good use
of it, warrior.
talk2022:
<sp:3:0:2:0600><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hm... I cannot feel the presence of the
Lightscale Trident anywhere in this world.

If that is what you seek... I suppose
I could craft one.
talk2018_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>That spear shining like the sun upon your
back... That is the Lightscale Trident,
correct?
That weapon is not some trinket to be
duplicated without purpose.<sp:5:1:0> There is no
need for me to craft another at present.
talk2024:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Angry_01>No...<sp:5:1:0> I can still feel the presence of 
the Lightscale Trident somewhere in
this world.
You do not have it with you...<sp:5:1:0>but it must
be somewhere out there.

It would be most unfortunate if it fell into
the hands of monsters.<sp:5:1:0> You must go in
search of it.
talk2008:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_01>Beyond the sludge, <sp:5:0:0>my real problem is
the weapons that decayed because of
the Upheaval.
Worse still, the distinguished trade of
blacksmithing has utterly changed in
this day and age.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Have a blade that is ready to shatter?
Just take a monster horn or fang, stick it
on, and that is that. The job is done.
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Work_01>If my father's generation saw the state of
things today, they would certainly flood
the domain with their tears.
talk2025:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad_00>If ever it breaks, is lost, or disappears
from this world, come to me at once.<sp:5:0:0>
I will make you another.
talk2026:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_00>Have a weapon that is utterly decayed?
Just take a monster horn or fang, stick it
on, and that is that. The job is done.
It is a travesty to equate such foolishness
with the true work of a blacksmith.
talk2009:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Link. <sp:5:1:0>Have you already spoken with
<clr:0000>Lady Yona<clr:ffff>?

She is attempting to repair your
<clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>.

<snd:TalkPositive>You know full well that the <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>
allows even a Hylian like you to climb
waterfalls.
It is essential if you hope to travel these
parts with ease.
talk2014_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>With a Zora spear, <sp:5:0:0>three diamonds,<sp:5:0:0>
and five pieces of flint, I can craft
the <clr:0000>Lightscale Trident<clr:ffff> for you.
talk2027:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>You know full well that the <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>
allows even a Hylian like you to climb
waterfalls.
It is essential if you hope to travel these
parts with ease.
talk2028:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>I have heard whispers that the <clr:0000>ancient
arowana <clr:ffff>has been spotted near <clr:0000>Mipha's
statue<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> at the peak of Ploymus Mountain.
Few have ever caught this rare fish,
which was used in the distant past
to repair Zora armor...
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Why has it appeared again?<sp:5:1:0> Is this, too,
a result of the Upheaval?
talk2011:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> Your Zora armor has been repaired!


<sp:3:0:2:0100>Now you can climb waterfalls as well as
a Zora.<sp:5:1:0> How impressive that she was able
to fix it for you.
talk2029:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>Good...<sp:5:0:0> Your Zora armor has at last been
returned to its original condition.

Now you can climb waterfalls as well as a
Zora.<sp:5:1:0> Do not neglect to make good use of
this priceless treasure.
talk2012:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>I suppose, aside from King Sidon,
the only warrior suited for a Champion's
weapon...<sp:5:0:0>is you.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Even if the Lightscale Trident is lost,<sp:5:1:0> bring
the necessary materials, and I, Dento,
will craft you another.
talk2009_1:
<clr:0000>Lady Yona <clr:ffff>is at the <clr:0000>infirmary<clr:ffff>. I suggest
you confer with her there at once.
talk2013:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>You should leave.<sp:5:0:0> And take the
Zora armor with you.

The number of wounds it's taken in your
stead... <sp:5:1:0>Such is the honor of armor.
talk2030:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Well, you had best be off.<sp:5:0:0> I have no doubt
that your Zora armor will be of great use
to you.
talk2009_2:
It may be best for you to visit <clr:0000>Mipha Court<clr:ffff>
and consult with <clr:0000>Lady Yona <clr:ffff>there.
talk2031:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I have heard whispers that what you seek
has been spotted near <clr:0000>Mipha's statue<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0>
which is at the peak of Ploymus Mountain.
This rare fish that has almost never been
caught and was used in the distant past
to repair the Zora armor...
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Why has it appeared again?<sp:5:1:0> Is this, too,
a result of the Upheaval?
talk2014:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>So, Link... You have returned.


Since you are here at my forge, it can only
mean one thing. You desire to possess
the Lightscale Trident. Correct?
talk2032: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>So, it is you... <sp:5:0:0>Do you need something?
talk2015:
<sp:3:0:2:0600><snd:Greeting_00>If you have business with the head
craftsman, Dento, feel free to state it.
talk2033:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I see.<sp:5:0:0> You seek an <clr:0000>ancient arowana<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
In that case...
talk2016:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_00>May your life be long and blessed
with luck.
